mapper.sql: ID, NAME, CATEGORY, INDUSTRY, PIC, DISTRIBUTOR_ID, COMPANY_ID, FACTORY_ID, BRAND_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR
mapper.select:
select t.*, c.ID As C_ID, c.NAME As C_NAME, c.ID_TYPE As C_ID_TYPE, c.ID_CODE As C_ID_CODE, c.COMPANY_TYPE As C_COMPANY_TYPE, c.LEGAL_PERSON As C_LEGAL_PERSON, c.REG_ADDR As C_REG_ADDR, c.BUSINESS_ADDR As C_BUSINESS_ADDR, c.ADDR As C_ADDR, c.BUSINESS_BEGIN As C_BUSINESS_BEGIN, c.BUSINESS_END As C_BUSINESS_END, c.CONTACTER As C_CONTACTER, c.PHONE As C_PHONE, c.MAIL As C_MAIL, c.MPHONE As C_MPHONE, c.BUSINESS_SCOPE As C_BUSINESS_SCOPE, c.BUSINESS_LICENSE As C_BUSINESS_LICENSE, c.QESE As C_QESE, c.QESE_CODE As C_QESE_CODE, c.QESE_FILE As C_QESE_FILE, c.DESCRIMINATOR As C_DESCRIMINATOR, c.CREATE_TIME As C_CREATE_TIME, c.CREATOR As C_CREATOR, c.STATUS As C_STATUS from COMMODITY t LEFT JOIN COMPANY c ON t.COMPANY_ID = c.ID
t.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') AND
c.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{cname},'%') AND
c.ID_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code},'%') AND
t.DISTRIBUTOR_ID = #{distributorId} AND
t.STATUS != 0
t.STATUS = 1
1 < t.STATUS and t.STATUS < 5
t.STATUS = 5
t.STATUS < 0
t.STATUS = 2
t.STATUS = -2
t.STATUS = 3
t.STATUS = 4
t.STATUS = -4
t.STATUS = -5
t.STATUs = #{status}
order by t.create_time desc
SELECT ID, NAME FROM COMMODITY WHERE STATUS > 1 AND STATUS < 4

select t.*, c.ID As C_ID, c.NAME As C_NAME, c.ID_TYPE As C_ID_TYPE, c.ID_CODE As C_ID_CODE, c.COMPANY_TYPE As C_COMPANY_TYPE, c.LEGAL_PERSON As C_LEGAL_PERSON, c.REG_ADDR As C_REG_ADDR, c.BUSINESS_ADDR As C_BUSINESS_ADDR, c.ADDR As C_ADDR, c.BUSINESS_BEGIN As C_BUSINESS_BEGIN, c.BUSINESS_END As C_BUSINESS_END, c.CONTACTER As C_CONTACTER, c.PHONE As C_PHONE, c.MAIL As C_MAIL, c.MPHONE As C_MPHONE, c.BUSINESS_SCOPE As C_BUSINESS_SCOPE, c.BUSINESS_LICENSE As C_BUSINESS_LICENSE, c.QESE As C_QESE, c.QESE_CODE As C_QESE_CODE, c.QESE_FILE As C_QESE_FILE, c.DESCRIMINATOR As C_DESCRIMINATOR, c.CREATE_TIME As C_CREATE_TIME, c.CREATOR As C_CREATOR, c.STATUS As C_STATUS,
f.ID As F_ID, f.NAME As F_NAME, f.ID_TYPE As F_ID_TYPE, f.ID_CODE As F_ID_CODE, f.COMPANY_TYPE As F_COMPANY_TYPE, f.LEGAL_PERSON As F_LEGAL_PERSON, f.REG_ADDR As F_REG_ADDR, f.BUSINESS_ADDR As F_BUSINESS_ADDR, f.ADDR As F_ADDR, f.BUSINESS_BEGIN As F_BUSINESS_BEGIN, f.BUSINESS_END As F_BUSINESS_END, f.CONTACTER As F_CONTACTER, f.PHONE As F_PHONE, f.MAIL As F_MAIL, f.MPHONE As F_MPHONE, f.BUSINESS_SCOPE As F_BUSINESS_SCOPE, f.BUSINESS_LICENSE As F_BUSINESS_LICENSE, f.QESE As F_QESE, f.QESE_CODE As F_QESE_CODE, f.QESE_FILE As F_QESE_FILE, f.DESCRIMINATOR As F_DESCRIMINATOR, f.CREATE_TIME As F_CREATE_TIME, f.CREATOR As F_CREATOR, f.STATUS As F_STATUS,
b.ID As B_ID, b.NAME As B_NAME, b.OWNER As B_OWNER, b.CODE As B_CODE, b.BRAND_STATUS As B_BRAND_STATUS, b.REGISTRATION_CERTIFICATE As B_REGISTRATION_CERTIFICATE, b.NOTIFICATION As B_NOTIFICATION, b.AUTHORIZATION As B_AUTHORIZATION, b.DISTRIBUTOR_ID As B_DISTRIBUTOR_ID, b.CREATE_TIME As B_CREATE_TIME, b.CREATOR As B_CREATOR from COMMODITY t LEFT JOIN BRAND b ON t.BRAND_ID = b.ID LEFT JOIN COMPANY c ON t.COMPANY_ID = c.ID LEFT JOIN COMPANY f ON t.FACTORY_ID = f.ID WHERE t.STATUS = 5
mapper.insert: insert into COMMODITY (ID, NAME,MG_PRICE, CATEGORY, INDUSTRY, PIC, SP_VIDEO, DISTRIBUTOR_ID, COMPANY_ID, FACTORY_ID, BRAND_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, STATUS ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mg_price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sp_video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distributorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1 )

insert into COMMODITY
ID,
NAME,
MG_PRICE,
CATEGORY,
INDUSTRY,
PIC,
DISTRIBUTOR_ID,
COMPANY_ID,
FACTORY_ID,
BRAND_ID,
CREATE_TIME,
CREATOR,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mg_price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{distributorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{factoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update COMMODITY
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{mg_price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDUSTRY = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIC = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIC = #{sp_video,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISTRIBUTOR_ID = #{distributorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACTORY_ID = #{factoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
